title: The platform
subtitle: Angular 18 FTW!
intro: I decided to use angular to show off some of the various tricks it can do. One of the plans is to use HTTPclient to read some JSON data from a service. This will be an interesting exersise in reading data from external sources.

notes.note: I created a service called JasonService and referenced it in the app.component.ts (We are working with standalone components now, so there will not be a app.module.ts anymore.
from there I used the built in HTTPClient component to read from a json file and then used *ngfor loops to iterate through the json files.

title: Theming the site
subtitle: a few thoughts on the design choices I am making
